term.bonusIntro: The bonus is available only on the first deposit
term.step1: 1. Log in or register an account.
term.step3: 3. Make a deposit starting from 10 USD.
term.rule1: 1. The 100% bonus offer is available from 30.05.2025 until 31.12.2025.
term.rule2: 2. Activation is only possible on the first deposit.
term.rule3: 3. The maximum bonus amount is 1500 USD / 130,000 RUB.
term.rule4: 4. To activate the bonus offer, a single deposit of at least 10 USD / 1,000 RUB is required.
term.rule5: 5. Bonus funds will be credited to the Bonus Balance.
term.rule6: 6. Only bets placed on slots from the <0>"Games for bonus"</0> section count towards the wagering requirement.
term.rule7: 7. The bonus is wagered using the real balance first â€” specifically, the portion on which the bonus was credited â€” and then from the bonus balance.
term.rule8: 8. The bonus balance becomes available to all players who have wagered the deposit amount from their main balance. To continue playing using bonus funds, go to the "Balance Panel" (located in the website header), select "Bonus Balance" or visit "My wallets" section and activate "Bonus Balance" with a single click. If the activation is successful, a green indicator will appear next to "Bonus Balance." In case of an error, the system will automatically display a corresponding notification.
term.rule9: 9. The bonus amount must be wagered 35 times.
term.rule10: 10. Winnings from bets that do not count towards the wagering requirement will be credited to the real balance, but these funds cannot be used to wager the bonus.
term.rule11: 11. If a deposit is made while a bonus is active, the deposited amount can be used to meet the wagering requirement.
term.rule12: 12. The wagering period for the qualified deposit and the bonus percentage is 7 days from the moment of crediting.
term.rule13: 13. After completing the bonus wagering, a wagering requirement of X1 must be met for withdrawal according to the site rules.
term.rule14: 14. Withdrawal is not available during an active bonus.
term.rule15: 15. Only one bonus can be active in the casino at any given time.
term.rule16: 16. After fulfilling the wagering requirement, the winnings will be transferred to the real balance.
term.rule17: 17. If you cancel the bonus, the remaining funds in the real balance will be subject to a X1 wagering requirement, and the bonus funds will be canceled.
term.rule18: 18. The promotion is valid for only one phone number, account, address, IP address, bank card number, or crypto account. Repeated participation in the promotion is not allowed. Participating in the promotion under a different identity will result in the cancellation of results and account blocking without refunding any funds.
